Description: Lower part of black granite seated statue of Sarenput II; Hieroglyphic text on block-seat.
Curator's comments: Part of .98 Published: PM V: p. 234. HTBM Part 6: Plate 20. and Biri Fay, Festschrift Aldred 1997, pp. 97-112, BM OP 28, p.8, plates 16-20.
Associated names: Named in inscription & portrayed: Sarenput II
Acquisition name: Purchased through: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
